casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Douglas W. STANDARD 309P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Douglas Wayne Standard, for Standard, Douglas W. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of September 2018 by Defendant to Stay the Judgment:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
